text: Juan Quarterone Carbone (28 May 1935 – 23 November 2015) was an Argentine football midfielder. Nickname El Brujo (The Wizard) he played in Argentina and El Salvador. After retiring as a player he coached a number of teams in El Salvador and the El Salvador national team.
